ygData.msgSnippet: AzureBlade displayed some sort of friendly smile. Of course, being totally transmetal did not help the motion, but he managed it. AzureBlade: We are on

AzureBlade displayed some sort of friendly smile. Of course, being 
totally transmetal did not help the motion, but he managed it.

AzureBlade: We are on prehistoric Earth. There is a war going on, and 
there is a battle not far from here. You can check your sensors for 
confirmation. I, however, am not implicated in this battle. I came 
here directly for you. I felt your spark and...

Suddenly he was out of words. How should he say this? Of course, he 
was a warrior, tall, strong and proud. How could he say anything 
without making her go crazy at him? This was the first time it 
happened to him.

AzureBlade: The fact is I am a Maximal, and, if you would like, you 
can join my faction. By the way, what is your faction?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., HanaKirei85@a... wrote:
> <<> AzureBlade: I swear it upon the honor of my spark. You must be 
> > wondering where you are, right? Or what I am doing here?>>
> 
> His spark...
> 
> Mistra was confused by much of this, although she knew the value of 
a spark. 
> In response, her wings eased the rest of the way, settling flat upon 
her back 
> as before. She would trust him, and just have to hope she wouldn't 
regret it. 
> Or that her confusion would be taken advantage of just to win her to 
his 
> side...then again, how was she to be sure that wasn't her own side 
as well? 
> 
> With a slow nod, she replied "Yes..."
